description: In this action packed sequel, Markie and Cole realize that their desires for each other couldn't have surfaced at a more awkward time, as they dress for Markie's wedding. Cole is hard as a rock and ready to drive home the point, so he bends Markie over a side table and fucks him against a wall, before Markie mounts Cole and rides him home, losing his load as Cole continues to fuck him from underneath, before Cole pulls out and busts his nut all over Markie's back. Sated and secluded, the guys help themselves to a piece of Markie's wedding cake... someone may as well, because there definitely isn't going to be a wedding today.Enjoy!
title: Wedding Jitters Part 2
